definitions.definition: a change or difference in condition, amount, or level, typically with certain limits.
synonyms: imbalance; technicaldifferential "regional variations in farming practice"change
modification; diversification "opening times are subject to variation"deviation
fluctuation "there was very little variation from an understood pattern"

definitions.definition: a deviation of a celestial body from its mean orbit or motion.
a change in the value of a function due to small changes in the values of its argument or arguments.
the angular difference between true north and magnetic north at a particular place.
examples: noun: magnetic variation; plural noun: magnetic variations

definitions.definition: the occurrence of an organism in more than one distinct color or form.
a different or distinct form or version of something.
examples: hurling is an Irish variation of field hockey
synonyms: modification "hurling is an Irish variation of field hockey"

definitions.definition: a version of a theme, modified in melody, rhythm, harmony, or ornamentation, so as to present it in a new but still recognizable form.
examples: there is an eleven-bar theme followed by seven variations and a coda

definitions.definition: a solo dance as part of a performance.
